response.overview: Officer Chan Ka Kui manages to put a major Hong Kong drug dealer behind the bars practically alone, after a shooting and an impressive chase inside a slum. Now, he must protect the boss' secretary, Selina, who will testify against the gangster in court.
response.tagline: You may know the name, but the game has changed.
response.title: Police Story

cast.name: Michael Lai Siu-Tin
cast.character: Man Who Tries to Park Car
